metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25858 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: The package terser before 4.8.1, from 5.0.0 and before 5.14.2 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) due to insecure usage of regular expressions.

notes.Note: amurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 19.10, the chromium-browser package is just a script that installs the Chromium snap

criterions.comment: node-terser package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
